resources.string: A sample app to demonstrate the use of Cognito User Pools for authentication.

This is a sample app to showcase Cognito Identity and the SDK for Android.

Check your Cognito Identity Pool to ensure that there has been an authenticated access. Also check that your client was accessed as intended.\n\nThis example added a newly signed up user to a DynamoDB database and updated the number of sign ins for an existing user if logged in.
